sentences.en: In Baghdad, water trucks were also used to transport water to hospitals and residents at outskirt.
sentences.cn: 在巴格达, 水车不停将食水运送往各医院及市郊的居民.

sentences.en: Mianyang Nanjiao Airport is seated in southern outskirt of Minayang city proper, operating flights to Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou.

sentences.en: On the outskirt of town, a pick - up truck is waiting.

sentences.en: Since remove to outskirt, I went for a walk at here heaps of times.

sentences.en: The hotel is situated in the outskirt of the city.
sentences.cn: 这个酒店位于城市的郊区,是全城最好的酒店之一.
